Posts.Content: I had a WLE and a sentinel node biopsy on 29th December to remove a tumour and 3 nodes. Recovery was going well until this week. I started to develop soreness and a deep ache through to my back, week limbs and all body skin sensitivity. GP diagnosed an infection yesterday and prescribed antibiotics. When I spoke to my BCN she seemed surprised I had an infection but didn't offer any other explanation for my symptoms. I'm interested to know if anyone else develop ped issues weeks after surgery and the possible causes.
Posts.Title: Infection after surgery

Posts.Content: Thank you - it's good to know you came through this stage OK as feeling worried this morning - not sure antibiotics are working as redness is spreading and I feel as if I have flu!
